sentences.cn: 能力一般的高尔夫球手

sentences.en: A professional golfer usually has it all over an amateur.
sentences.cn: 职业高尔夫球员通常胜过业余的.

sentences.en: By all accounts, he's an excellent golfer.
sentences.cn: 人家都说他是一位十分出色的高尔夫球选手.

sentences.en: He declared his intention to become the best golfer in the world.
sentences.cn: 他表明自己想要成为世界上最好的高尔夫球选手。

sentences.en: I flatter myself that I'm the best golfer in the club.
sentences.cn: 我自认是这个俱乐部里高尔夫球打得最好的人.

sentences.en: It is unusual for a golfer to batter one of the marshals with his putter.
sentences.cn: 高尔夫球员用推杆殴打比赛组织官员实属罕见.

sentences.en: Sarazen became the first golfer to win all four majors.
sentences.cn: 萨拉岑成为了首位高尔夫四大满贯赛冠军。
她非常爱好打高尔夫球.

sentences.en: She was a good golfer and tennis player.
sentences.cn: 她是一名高尔夫球和网球好手。

sentences.en: Sure. Are you a pro - golfer?
sentences.cn: 当然了你是指也高尔夫球手 吗 ?

sentences.en: The Algarve is a golfer's paradise.
sentences.cn: 阿尔加维是高尔夫球手的天堂。

sentences.en: The golfer is pictured on many of the front pages, kissing his trophy as he holds it aloft.
sentences.cn: 许多报纸的头版上都刊登了那个高尔夫球手高高举起奖杯亲吻的照片。

sentences.en: The golfer lost four strokes trying to get the ball out of the sand trap.
sentences.cn: 那个高尔夫球手花了四杆去打那落入沙坑的球.

sentences.en: The golfer was two strokes up on his opponent.
sentences.cn: 该高尔夫球选手胜对手两穴.

sentences.en: There are those who believe that Nick Price is just about the best golfer in the world.
sentences.cn: 有一些人认为尼克·普赖斯几乎就是世界上最优秀的高尔夫球运动员了。

words.tran_cn: 高尔夫球；高尔夫球运动

trans.tran_cn: 高尔夫球手，打高尔夫球的人，高尔夫球运动员
trans.tran_en: A golfer is a person who plays golf for pleasure or as a profession
